Hello,

Hi, Do you have HHhH by Laurent Binet? Thanks

Hey bbs, I've been looking for awhile and I was wondering if you have The Real Crash - by Peter Schiff

I've been dying to read it... if you don't, you should check it out yourself if you're into economics.

When I see {BBS} on a torrent I know it is a decent, no BS torrent.  Thank you very much. 

In this torrent you included "Uncle John's Bathroom Reader". I've read one of this series in paperback, now I've got another. Do you have any more of these? Great misc info books to pass the time (among other things) while sitting on the throne.

@simon19771

I don't have an English version yet.I should get it soon and I will upload it :)
My bookclub is doing Kashmir Shawl next month.  Any chance you have that?
Hi, I'm looking for the Private series by James Patterson - any chance you can up load them if you have access??
